name: Message Header
notes: To head, identify and specify a message.

elements.name: Unique message reference assigned by the sender
elements.notes: Unique message reference assigned by the sender

elements.name: Message type
elements.notes: Code identifying a type of message and assigned by its controlling agency.

elements.name: Message version number
elements.notes: Version number of a message type

elements.name: Message release number
elements.notes: Release number within the current message type version number (0052).

elements.name: Controlling agency
elements.notes: Code to identify the agency controlling the specification, maintenance and publication of the message type.

name: Beginning of message
notes: To indicate the type and function of a message and to transmit the identifying number.

elements.name: Document/message name
elements.notes: Identification of a type of document/message by code or name. Code preferred.

elements.name: Document/message name, coded
elements.notes: Code to identify the agency controlling the specification, maintenance and publication of the message type.

elements.name: Document/message number
elements.notes: Reference number assigned to the document/message by the issuer

elements.name: Message function, coded
elements.notes: Code indicating the function of the message

name: Date/time/period
notes: To specify date, and/or time, or period.

elements.name: Date/time/period
elements.notes: Code specifying type of date or time, or both date and time

elements.name: Date/time/period qualifier

data_type_ids.61: Cancel if not delivered by this date

elements.notes: Code indicating the function of the message

elements.name: Date/time/period
elements.notes: The value of a date, a date and time, a time or of a period in a specified representation.

elements.name: Date/time/period format qualifier
elements.notes: The value of a date, a date and time, a time or of a period in a specified representation.

name: Free text
notes: To provide free form or coded text information.

elements.name: Text subject qualifier
elements.notes: Code specifying subject of a free text.

elements.name: Authorization Information
elements.notes: Code specifying how to handle the text.

elements.name: Text reference
elements.notes: Coded reference to a standard text and its source.

elements.name: Free text, coded
elements.notes: Free text in coded form.

elements.name: Text literal
elements.notes: Free text; one to five lines.

elements.name: Free text
elements.notes: Free text field available to the message sender for information.

name: Reference
notes: To specify a reference

elements.name: Reference
elements.notes: Identification of a reference

elements.name: Reference number
elements.notes: Identification number the nature and function of which can be qualified by an entry in data element 1153 Reference qualifier

name: Name and address
notes: To specify the name/address and their related function, either by CO82 only and/or unstructured by CO58 or structured by CO80 thru 3207.

elements.name: Party qualifier
elements.notes: Code giving specific meaning to a party

elements.name: Party identification details
elements.notes: Identification of a reference

elements.name: Party id. identification
elements.notes: Code identifying a party involved in a transaction

elements.name: Code list qualifier
elements.notes: Identification of a code list

elements.name: Name and address
elements.notes: Unstructured name and address: one to five lines

elements.name: Name and address line
elements.notes: Free form name and address description

name: Currencies
notes: To specify currencies used in the transaction and relevant details for the rate of exchange

elements.name: Currency details
elements.notes: The usage to which a currency relates

elements.name: Currency details qualifier
elements.notes: Specification of the usage to which the currency relates

elements.name: Currency, coded
elements.notes: Identification of the name or symbol of the monetary unit involved in the transaction

name: Payment terms basis
notes: To specify the payment terms basis

elements.name: Payment terms type qualifier
elements.notes: Identification of the type of payment terms

elements.name: Payment terms
elements.notes: This should be a unique control # for each transaction set functional group

elements.name: Terms of payment identification

data_type_ids.5: Draft(s) drawn on any other drawee

elements.notes: Identification of the terms of payment between the parties to a transaction (generic term)

elements.name: Terms/time information
elements.notes: Time details in payment terms

elements.name: Payment time reference, coded
elements.notes: Code relating payment terms to the date of a specific event

elements.name: Time relation, coded

data_type_ids.11: End of ten day period following month after reference date's month
data_type_ids.12: End of half year containing the reference date

elements.notes: Code relating payment terms to a time before, on or after the reference date

elements.name: Type of period, coded
elements.notes: Agreed or specified period of time (coded)

elements.name: Number of periods
elements.notes: Number of periods of the type indicated in data element 2151 Type of period, coded

name: Note/Special Instruction
notes: The NTE segment permits free-form information/data which, under ANSI X12 standard implementations, is not machine processable. The use of the NTE segment should therefore be avoided, if at all possible, in an automated environment.

elements.name: Note Reference Code
elements.notes: Code identifying the functional area or purpose for which the note applies

elements.name: Description
elements.notes: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

name: Currency
notes: If the CUR segment is not used, monetary values are assumed to be expressed in the currency of the country of the transaction originator.

elements.notes: Code identifying an organizational entity, a physical location, property or an individual

elements.name: Currency Code

elements.notes: Value to be used as a multiplier conversion factor to convert monetary value from one currency to another

name: Terms of Sale/Deferred Terms of Sale
notes: To specify terms of sale. In the Header position of the Invoice X12 EDI document, this segment is used to specify terms of the invoice. In the transitional period for the microcomputer industry, from paper to full automated EDI transactions, there may be a perceived need to send text data with the terms. Clearly the goal is to have the entire microcomputer industry participating in EDI. Therefore, if text data is needed to be sent for terms, ITD 12 will contain the free form text. If additional text is needed, additional ITD segments should be used.

elements.name: Terms Type Code

elements.name: Terms Basis Date Code
elements.notes: Code identifying the beginning of the terms period

elements.notes: Available to hospital if invoice is paid on or before Terms Discount Due Date

name: Transaction Totals
notes: To transmit a hash total for a specific element in the transaction set

elements.name: Number of Line Items
elements.notes: Total number of line items in the transaction set

elements.name: Hash totals
elements.notes: Total of the number of units invoiced (sum of element IT102)

name: Transaction Set Trailer
notes: To indicate the end of the transaction set and provide the count of the transmitted segments (including the beginning (ST) and ending (SE) segments)

elements.name: Number of Included Segments
elements.notes: Total number of segments included in a transaction set including ST and SE segments

elements.name: Transaction Set Control Number
elements.notes: Identifying control number that must be unique within the transaction set functional group assigned by the originator for a transaction set. Must match the control # in ST02

name: Functional Group Trailer
notes: To indicate the end of a functional group and to provide control information

elements.name: Number of Transaction Sets Included
elements.notes: Total number of transaction sets included in the functional group or interchange (transmission) group terminated by the trailer containing this data element

elements.name: Group Control Number
elements.notes: Assigned number originated and maintained by the sender

name: Interchange Control Trailer
notes: To define the end of an interchange of zero or more functional groups and interchange-related control segments

elements.name: Number of Included Functional Groups
elements.notes: A count of the number of functional groups included in an interchange

elements.name: Interchange Control Number
elements.notes: A control number assigned by the interchange sender
